messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hey, hey, right now, a man.
Yo, there's a guy, there's a guy.
He's at the mall with a gun right now.
Okay, where in the mall is he?
He's at the community college right now.
Is he inside the building or outside?
He's just outside the building.
He's shooting people right now!
Does anybody know what he looks like?
He's a white guy, with short hair. He has a shotgun.
Do you know if anybody's injured?
I'm outside. I haven't seen him shoot anyone, but he's in the building now.
Did you see what kind of vehicle he arrived in?
A white Honda Civic.
Stay on the line. Do not go inside. We have officers on their way.
He's running into the mall right now.
Okay, where exactly in the mall is he heading?
Towards the main entrance. He just entered the mall.
Please stay where you are and do not go inside. We have officers responding.
Alright.
Can you see any officers approaching?
Yes, they are heading towards the entrance right now.
Alright, thank you. Stay safe.
Hi, I just want to make sure that somebody has called about the guy with a shotgun at New River Community College.
Yes, we have officers on their way. Do you know if anyone is injured?
I'm not inside; I just saw the guy run in.
Okay, stay safe. Thank you for calling.
Hello, there's someone shooting in the mall.
Do you know if anybody is hurt?
No clue. We locked our store, but people are running everywhere.
Okay, stay in your store and keep the door locked. We have officers on the way.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, someone at New River Community College has a shotgun!
What does he look like?
He's a young white male, short hair, wearing a t-shirt.
Is everyone leaving the building?
Yes, everyone's trying to get out.
Do you know if anyone is hurt?
I'm not sure; I'm outside.
Can you tell where he parked his car?
A white four-door car right in front of the doors.
Okay, stay safe. We have officers coming.
Thank you.
Hello?
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I'm at Christiansburg Mall and there's a shooter.
Do you know if the shooter is still in the college area or in the mall?
I'm not sure, but people are saying he's in the mall now.
Are you in a safe location?
Yes, I'm in a locked store.
Stay locked in and keep away from the doors. We have officers on the way.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, we were told to lock down all the stores at the mall. What's going on?
There's a gunman inside the mall. Keep your door locked and stay inside. We have officers responding.
Okay, we've got five customers in here with us.
That’s good. Stay safe and keep the doors locked.
Alright, thank you.
